detail_desc: Vest top in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Trousers woven in a stretch Tencel™ lyocell blend with a detachable tie belt at the waist and zip fly with a button. Patch front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shorts in woven fabric with contrasting colour grosgrain side stripes. Elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly, zipped side pockets and an open back pocket.
Quilted, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a soft, matt finish. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with lace trims and embroidery at the top. Small stand-up collar with a frill trim and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a lace trim at the front and gathers at the back. Frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with frill trims. Unlined.

Padded jacket in a nylon weave with a fleece-lined stand-up collar and a detachable hood with an elastic drawstring. Zip with a chin guard and wind flap with concealed hook and loop fastening down the front. Zipped side pockets, a flap sleeve pocket and an inner pocket. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short skirt in patterned jersey containing glittery threads with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.

Long, flared dress in a patterned weave. Narrow cut at the top with a slim band at the neckline, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Satin lining.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave. Extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back, long sleeves and a gathered seam with narrow elastication down the front.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.

Blouse in a soft weave with a unique nursing feature, a V-neck with pleats and a pleat at the back. Long, wide sleeves with gathers and buttoned cuffs. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, gathers at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Striped poncho in an airy weave with open sides held together by tasselled ties. Slightly longer at the back. Width 100 cm. Length at the front 82 cm.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs with covered elastication and a lined gusset.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, side and back pockets and a zip fly and button.
Blouse in a stretch weave with a boat neck, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish and embroidered motif on the front and down the sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and gathers in the side seams for a good fit over the tummy.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a decorative knot detail at the hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem.
Tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Cycling shorts in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length dress in a fine knit with a slight sheen. Short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined.

Sandals in glittery imitation leather with an embroidered appliqué on the foot strap, and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and transparent soles with motion-activated flashing lights.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft, fine knit.

Stretch cotton twill cargo joggers in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short dressing gown in soft, fluffy velour with a hood and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with a decorative pompom trim and embroidery. V-neck, round, spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Lined.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and buttons at the front. Seam at the waist with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.

Shirt in a stretch premium cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Shaping seams at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.

Short, A-line dress in a jacquard weave made from recycled polyester. Double-layered stand-up collar with pleats and a V-shaped opening at the front, long puff sleeves and gathered tiers to the hem for added width in the skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.

Straight-cut jacket in a sturdy weave with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted fastening. Concealed side pockets, a tab and adjustable fastening at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in cotton twill. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, side and back pockets, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace details at the sides.
Straight-cut shirt in Tencel® lyocell denim with a collar, classic front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with moss-knit stripes, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with wide smocking at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shirt in patterned viscose with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Straight-cut hem, slightly longer at the back.
Velour pyjamas with an appliqué detail at the front and on the feet, and press-studs along one side and leg.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cropped vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, deep armholes and a raw, roll-edge hem.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a wide, foldover hem.
Treggings in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Dip-dyed top in sweatshirt fabric with a glittery print, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Double-breasted, straight-style coat in a felted wool blend with peak lapels, flap front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Tunic in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Knee-length dress in silk with a lightly brushed finish. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover, short, wide sleeves, seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Platform sandals with wrapover straps in imitation suede decorated with studs and plastic beads. Moulded insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform height approx. 3.5 cm.
Metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Length 5.5 cm.
Vest top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top and an overlocked hem.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, airy slub jersey with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and classic front. Matching tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey with a slight sheen, with a V-neck and wide butterfly sleeves that are slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder and gently rounded hem.
Wide satin trousers with high slits in the sides, side pockets, a welt back pocket and a concealed zip in the side.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Sleeveless top in smocked viscose with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and a short frill trim at the top and hem.
